ports.name: Write
ports.text: Executes the op, writes the data to ThingSpeak

ports.name: Field
ports.text: The field you want to write into â€“ `field1`, `field2` and so on (this is not the field name!).

ports.name: Value
ports.text: The value you want to write

ports.name: Write API Key
ports.text: Your API key with write access

ports.name: When Finished
ports.text: Triggers when the write command has finished

ports.name: Success
ports.text: Whether or not the write command succeeded

ports.name: Rows
ports.text: The number of data-rows in your channel. After a successful write request this will be one bigger than before
